effect.diamond_pearl: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move while in hyper mode.
effect.platinum: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move while in hyper mode.
effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Inflicts regular damage. User’s critical hit rate is one level higher when using this move while in hyper mode.

short_effect.diamond_pearl: Has an increased chance for a critical hit in Hyper Mode.
short_effect.platinum: Has an increased chance for a critical hit in Hyper Mode.
short_effect.heartgold_soulsilver: Has an increased chance for a critical hit in Hyper Mode.
